EN: "[#ff0000]Each time you take damage[/color] gain 5 AP."
"Recovers [#00ff00]+2 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"
"Recovers [#00ff00]+4 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"
"Recovers [#00ff00]+8 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"
"Recovers [#00ff00]+0~5 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"
"Recovers [#00ff00]+0~10 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"
"Recovers [#00ff00]+0~18 HP[/color] at the end of each stage"

KR: "[#ff0000]항상 가장 먼 적을 타겟으로 삼게 됩니다.[/color]\n\n신중하게 선택하세요!"
EN: "[#ff0000]You will always target the furthest enemy.[/color]\n\nChoose carefully!"
[#ff0000]You will always perform melee actions.[/color]\n\nChoose carefully!

KR: "[#fff98f]치명적인 피해를 받았을 때,[/color] [#ff006b]해당 공격을 무효화하고 모든 체력을 회복합니다.[/color]\n(4회 남음)"
EN: "[#fff98f]When receiving critical damage,[/color] [#ff006b]nullifies the attack and restores all HP.[/color]\n(4 remaining)"

KR: "[#fff98f]치명적인 피해를 받았을 때,[/color] [#ff006b]해당 공격을 무효화하고 모든 체력을 회복합니다.[/color]\n(3회 남음)"
EN: "[#fff98f]When receiving critical damage,[/color] [#ff006b]nullifies the attack and restores all HP.[/color]\n(3 remaining)"

KR: "[#fff98f]치명적인 피해를 받았을 때,[/color] [#ff006b]해당 공격을 무효화하고 모든 체력을 회복합니다.[/color]\n(2회 남음)"
EN: "[#fff98f]When receiving critical damage,[/color] [#ff006b]nullifies the attack and restores all HP.[/color]\n(2 remaining)"

KR: "[#fff98f]치명적인 피해를 받았을 때,[/color] [#ff006b]해당 공격을 무효화하고 모든 체력을 회복합니다.[/color]\n(1회 남음)"
EN: "[#fff98f]When receiving critical damage,[/color] [#ff006b]nullifies the attack and restores all HP.[/color]\n(1 remaining)"

KR: "[#e5b9b9]회복할 때마다 (3+주문력의 10%)의 데미지를 가진 깃털을 적에게 발사합니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#e5b9b9]Each time you heal, fire a feather with (3+10% of SP) damage at the enemy.[/color]"

KR: "[#fff98f]근접 행동을 시작할 때마다 (3+주문력의 10%)의 데미지를 가진 깃털을 적에게 발사합니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#e5b9b9]Each time you start melee action, fire a feather with (3+10% of SP) damage at the enemy.[/color]"

KR: "[#7debff]원거리 행동을 시작할 때마다 (4+주문력의 10%)의 데미지를 가진 깃털을 적에게 발사합니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#7debff]Whenever you start far action, fire a feather at the enemy that deals (4+10% of SP) damage.[/color]"

KR: "[#ff0000]피해를 받을 때마다 (4+주문력의 10%)의 데미지를 가진 깃털을 적에게 발사합니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#ff0000]Whenever you get damage, fire a feather at the enemy that deals (4+10% of SP) damage.[/color]"

KR: "[#ff0000]대시를 할 때마다 (3+주문력의 10%)의 데미지를 가진 깃털을 적에게 발사합니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#ff0000]Whenever you dash, fire a feather at the enemy that deals (3+10% of SP) damage.[/color]"
"[#ff0000]Each time you take damage[/color] [#00ff00]recover (3+10% of SP) health.[/color]"
"[#00ff00]Recovers +(2+10% of SP) HP at the start of melee action.[/color]"
"[#00ff00]Gain AP equal to 20% of maximum health.[/color]"
"Gain additional damage in proportion to the distance to the enemy.\n(Up to 100%)"

KR: "[rainbow]원거리 행동[/rainbow]: 제자리에서 [#fff98f]메테오를 소환합니다.[/color]\n메테오는 적에게 [#ff4c97]주문력+1[/color] 만큼의 피해를 입힙니다."
EN: "When you are far from an enemy, stand still and [#fff98f]summon a meteor.[/color]\nMeteor give damage equal to [#ff4c97]SP +1[/color] to the enemy."
"[#ff0000]Each time you take damage[/color] gain 5 SP."

KR: "[rainbow]전투 시작 후 5초간 받는 모든 피해가 1이 됩니다.[/rainbow]"
EN: [rainbow]For 5 seconds after the start of battle, all damage received becomes 1.[/rainbow]
"Each time you deal to an enemy, gain [#00ff00]3 [#ff4c97]SP[/color].[/color]"

KR: "[#fff98f]땅에 착지할 때마다 착지 속도에 비례한 데미지를 모든 적에게 줍니다.[/color]"
EN: "[#fff98f]Each time you land on the ground, deal damage to all enemies proportional to your landing speed.[/color]"
